body: This belt grants its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution. Treat this as a temporary ability bonus for the first 24 hours the belt is worn. Also, as an immediate action three times per day, the wearer can call upon the belt to reroll a saving throw made to resist a disease or poison. The wearer must use the second roll, even if it is worse.
name: Plague Rat Belt
